name: supercat.vim
description:
Add colors to your Supercat ( http://supercat.nosredna.net ) configuration files.

Here's one example of the results:

http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/6496/supercatsyntax.png

Of course, you can set the colors to whatever you like.
install_details:
1 - Put the supercat.vim file in to your $HOME/.vim/after/syntax directory. 
2 - Put this line in to your $HOME/.vimrc: 

     set syntax on 

3 - Put the following line in your supercat config file: 

     # vim: filetype=supercat

4 - Quit and restart vim

versions.release_notes: Fixed extraneous highlighting of elements that weren't part of any group.
